name: visualizer-micro
description: A JS micro library that simplifies getting spectrum and waveform data from an audio source using the HTML5 Web Audio API.

scripts.build: browserify src/visualizer-micro.js -s VisualizerMicro > dist/visualizer-micro.js; browserify -t uglifyify src/visualizer-micro.js -s VisualizerMicro > dist/visualizer-micro.min.js

author: Chris Dolphin
